friendlyName: SUPPPLEMENTAL - TCGA PANCANCER CLINICAL DATA RESOURCE (TCGA-CDR)

fields.description: Row number from excel spread sheet
fields.name: Row

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: bcr_patient_barcode

fields.description: cancer type such as brca, ov, blca, skcm, gbm, and so on.
fields.name: type

fields.description: Age, in years, at which a condition or disease was first diagnosed
fields.name: age_at_initial_pathologic_diagnosis

fields.description: The race of a participant, independent from ethnicity; eg. White, Black or African American, Asian, Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander, American Indian or Alaska Native
fields.name: race

fields.description: The stage of the cancer, based on surgery or biopsy; eg. Stage II, Stage III, Stage IV, Stage IVA, Stage IIIB, Stage IIIS, Stage IIIC
fields.name: ajcc_pathologic_tumor_stage

fields.description: The stage of the cancer, based on results of tests done before surgery, such as physical exams and imaging scans; eg. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III, Stage IV
fields.name: clinical_stage

fields.description: Four digit year of the initial pathologic diagnosis
fields.name: histological_type

fields.description: Term to describe the number of levels or 'tiers' in the system used to describe the cellular histologic grade in a tissue specimen. NCI CDE: 3385981
fields.name: histological_grade

fields.description: Four digit year of the initial pathologic diagnosis
fields.name: initial_pathologic_dx_year

fields.description: The response that describes the menopausal status of a patient (a condition or state relating to the permanent cessation of menses).
fields.name: menopause_status

fields.description: Days since birth (a negative value, relative to the date of diagnosis which is considered to be t=0)
fields.name: birth_days_to

fields.description: The latest updated vital status from follow-up data, eg Alive, Dead, [Discrepancy], NULL
fields.name: vital_status

fields.description: The latest updated tumor status from follow-up data
fields.name: tumor_status

fields.description: The latest 'last_contact_days_to' updated from the follow-up data files
fields.name: last_contact_days_to

fields.description: The available 'death_days_to' from the follow-up data files
fields.name: death_days_to

fields.description: The available 'cause_of_death' from the follow-up data files
fields.name: cause_of_death
